# [Using The Editor](/docs/editor) / Scene Tree

The Scene Tree Panel shows you the hierarchy of your scene, so you can see every object at a glance and how they are parented to each other.

<DocImage src="docs/editor/panels/scenetree.jpg" alt="Polygonjs Scene Tree Panel" />

You currently need to click the refresh button to see any change, but we'll make that easier in the future.
